email_chain.subject: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a wheat shipment from Buenos Aires to Rotterdam. The vessel, MV OCEAN STAR, has a DWT of 75000 and an LOA of 225m. The cargo size is 50000MT, and we are offering a freight rate of $45/MT under CIF terms.

The laycan is 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering it to $40/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the stem status?

Best regards,
James Wilson
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your response. We can lower the rate to $42/MT, considering the current market conditions. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, and the stem is confirmed.

Please let me know if this revised rate works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The revised rate of $42/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and provide the final details for the shipment.

Best regards,
James Wilson
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Great to hear that! The laycan is confirmed for 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. We will ensure that all necessary documentation is prepared and sent to you shortly.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We are all set on our end.

Looking forward to a smooth operation.

Best regards,
James Wilson
Global Cargo
